entry.title: Derby Originals Heavy Duty Fly Masks with Ears - Closeout
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 17.95

This premium quality fly mask was made to last for several fly seasons. Made from heavy duty 1000 x 2000 denier polyester vinyl-coated mesh, this mask is designed to withstand the most extreme conditions. Keep your horse cool while providing shade.

 

This is an older stock item that was found in the warehouse. It has not been used. It is not eligible to be returned.

entry.title: Derby Originals Horse Fly Mask with Nose Cover No Ears Super Sale
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 14.95

This quality riding fly mask was made to keep your horse fly free on the hottest of days. Made from quality nylon mesh, this mask is lightweight and comfortable while still providing the best protection against insects.

Small - Pony - 500-700 lbs

Medium - Cob/Arabian - 700-1000 lbs

Large - Full Horse - 1000-1200 lbs

X-Large - Oversize - 1200-1500 lbs
  • Breathable and non heat transferable
  • Special darts keep mask out of horse's eyes
  • Nonremovable nose flap
  • Ear openings to allow ear movement and adjustable Velcro throat strap

entry.title: Derby Originals Economy Mesh Lycra Horse Fly Mask with Ears
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 14.95

These economy fly masks are made with Stretch fit and are from an older lot. Discounted for a quick sale, all sales are final. Please be aware these are a final-sale, economy item.

This item is not eligible for returns, exchanges, or warranties under any circumstances. Please consult our size chart when purchasing as we will not do exchanges for different sizes/colors. These fly masks have a large fit, keep that in mind when purchasing.

These fly masks are a closeout economy item and once they are sold out, they will not be available again so get yours while you can!

IMPROVED DESIGN - new for 2019, these fly masks now feature soft mesh ears to provide optimal comfort to your horse.

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - this innovative lycra fly mask features a soft mesh ear design that is designed to protect your horse’s delicate ears while the soft lycra body is gentle on the skin and comfortable for long term wear.

FORM FITTING LYCRA STRETCH DESIGN - this fly mask is made from a four-way stretch lycra material that conforms to the skin, creating a bug-proof barrier. These fly masks are great for horses who can remove traditional fly masks.

BREATHABLE NON HEAT TRANSFERABLE FABRIC - this fly mask is made from materials that are highly breathable and will not transfer heat so that your horse will not become hot or sweaty under their fly mask.

PROTECTS YOUR HORSE FROM PESTS - this fly mask is designed to keep flies and other biting pests away from your horse’s ears, face, and eyes, as well as shield your horse’s eyes and sensitive facial skin from harsh sunlight and harmful UV rays.

entry.title: Cashel Crusader Standard Mule Donkey Fly Mask with Long Nose and Ears
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cashel
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 31.95

The Crusader Fly Mask, with its patented three-hole cap eliminates forelock damage and ensures comfort with its unique design that stays put while your horse is stalled or turned out in the pasture. Soft coated nylon micro mesh blocks 70% of the sun’s damaging UV rays and protects the sensitive, soft tissues of the eyes and forehead. US Patent No. 6,128,891. Note all mule and donkey sizes have 13" ears.

s:variant.title: Small Quarter Horse / Arab / Cob / Grey

entry.title: Derby Originals UV-Blocker Premium Reflective Safety Horse Fly Mask with Ears and Nose Fringe with One Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 17.99 - 19.99 (30 variants)

Derby Originals premium UV-Blocker fly masks feature a mix of traditional design and premium features to give your horse the most comfortable fit possible while ensuring total protection from biting insects. These fly masks are made from sturdy mesh materials that are non-heat-transferring and breathable, while also blocking up to 75% of all UV rays. All of our fly masks feature stitched eye darts to prevent the mask from laying against the eyes, fleece edging for a comfortable no-rub fit, new soft-mesh ears, and secure double velcro closures. If you want to ensure your horse’s safety and comfort against pests like flies, mosquitoes, and gnats this summer, look no further than our world-class fly masks.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - our fly masks are designed with fleece edging to prevent rubs, eye darts that prevent the mesh of the mask from irritating your horse’s eyes, and non-heat transferring fabric.

BLOCKS UP TO 75% OF HARMFUL UV RAYS - this fly mask is made from materials that are designed to block up to 75% of harmful UV rays. This mask ideal for both average horses and light colored/blue eyed horses who are sun sensitive.

INNOVATIVE FRINGE DESIGN - this fly mask features an innovative nose fringe design that keeps your fly mask open, breathable, and out of the way while your horse eats and drinks while still protecting them from biting pests.

PROTECTS YOUR HORSE FROM PESTS - this fly mask is designed to keep flies and other biting pests away from your horse’s ears, face, and eyes, as well as shield your horse’s eyes and sensitive facial skin from harsh sunlight and harmful UV rays.

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - Derby Originals is proud to be the first brand in the US to offer a warranty on their fly masks. For more information or to register your product, go to our website at derbyoriginals.com.

entry.title: Paris Tack Crochet Horse Fly Veil Ear Bonnet with Gold Rope
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 14.99

Paris Tack Crochet Horse Fly Veil Ear Bonnet with Gold Rope has been designed to not only help your horse look great, but to keep them more comfortable and focused when under saddle. Our ear nets provide a barrier between your horse’s ears and the outside world, which helps to muffle loud sounds to keep your horse calm and focused during competitions and events. Our bonnets  also help protect against insect bites, sunburn, frostbite, dirt, debris, and more. This ear bonnet is made of soft woven cotton to promote optimum comfort. Cotton is breathable and gentle against your horse’s delicate skin, making it comfortable to wear any time of year.


  • HELPS TO KEEP YOUR HORSE FOCUSED - ear bonnets muffle sound, which can help keep your horse calm and focused when at a competition or under saddle. Our ear bonnets can be used in combination with earplugs for very nervous or sound-sensitive horses.
  • IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE EARS - our soft knit ear bonnets are made from breathable, soft, and comfortable to wear cotton that provides a barrier to protect your horse’s sensitive ears from dirt, debris, insects, loud sounds, and other irritations.
  • PREVENTS EAR IRRITATION - this cotton ear bonnet is designed to protect your horse’s delicate ears from things like sunburn, frostbite, bug bites, and more. Our ear nets are comfortable to wear year-round and are preferred by horses.
  • HAND CROCHETED DESIGN - these ear bonnets for horses have been hand crocheted by skilled craftsmen for a high-quality finish that will look great on your horse wherever you go: whether you're on a trail, at the barn, or in the show arena.
  • ELEGANT GOLD ROPE BROW - this fly veil features a pair of gold and white ropes across the brow, which adds elegance and flair to your show ensemble. This elegant bonnet is perfect for standing out at shows, competitions, and events.

entry.title: Derby Originals Mesh Belly Band Reflective Trim Horse Fly Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Sheets
Price: 52.99

Derby Originals’ premium mesh bellyband fly sheet was designed with your horse’s comfort and safety in mind. This fly sheet features a breathable mesh that helps keep your horse cool, as well as block harmful UV rays, and prevent biting insects from harming or irritating your horse. This fly sheet features new twists on the classic fly sheet design by adding back reflective strips to increase pasture visibility and safety and adding a full mesh belly band to keep insects away from your horse’s sensitive belly. The soft fleece wither relief also prevents your horse’s mane from being damaged. This blanket is fully adjustable and features adjustable chest closures, adjustable shoulder gussets, adjustable belly band straps, and adjustable crossed leg straps.

 

Features

    KEEPS PESTS AWAY - this fly sheet was designed to help protect your horse’s body, chest, and belly from biting insects and pests. Insects are unable to get through the mesh to bite at your horse, in turn preventing sores, irritation, and wounds from bug bites or reactions to them.

    COMFORTABLE FIT - our fly sheets have a soft fleece wither relief to prevent mane damage, soft trim covering the edges of the blanket, and are made with a mesh that won’t rub your horse’s fur or irritate their skin. The crossed leg straps are designed to prevent slippage or chafing.

    REFLECTIVE TRIM - the back corners of this fly sheet have strips of reflective material sewn onto them so that your horse will be visible from even great distances at night, making your horse more visible and safe at pasture, especially during times like hunting season!

    BREATHABLE DESIGN - this fly sheet is designed with a lightweight but strong mesh body that is breathable and helps keep your horse cool, while also keeping bugs away from them.

    ADJUSTABLE FIT - this fly sheet features adjustable shoulder gussets that allow your horse to move more freely, along with two adjustable chest straps and an adjustable belly band and leg straps in order to make sure your horse gets the best fit possible.

     

    Directions

    This product should be placed on your horse and used to keep biting insects and other pests away, protect your horse from harmful UV rays and help keep your horse cool. This fly sheet can be used in the barn or pasture.

entry.title: Derby Originals Easy On Horse Fly Fringe - Provides Protection from Insects without Impairing Vision - Attaches to Any Halter or Bridle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 6.99

Derby Originals classic easy-on horse fly fringe was designed to offer an easy solution to biting flies and other pests. These fly fringes are easily attachable to any halter or bridle and work to prevent flies from landing on your horse’s face and eyes without obscuring vision. A horse’s natural methods of fly protection stem from their mane and tail, which they use as a barrier against flies or to shoo flies away. Our fly fringes are designed to mimic this action through their design and movement. When your horse moves, the fringe moves in the same way as your horse’s hair, which makes it hard for flies to land on the face. These fly fringes can be attached to your horse’s favorite halter for use in the stall or pasture, or attached to your bridle for fly free riding.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - this nylon fly veil was designed with soft fringes that are comfortable for your horse to wear, and keeps flies at bay without irritating your horse.

A GREAT FLY MASK ALTERNATIVE - this fly fringe is ideal for horses who toss off or dislike fly masks. The fringe design allows your horse to freely see while still protecting their face and eyes from flies.

FEATURES HOOK AND LOOP CLOSURES - this fly fringe attaches to any halter or bridle with a pair of hook and loop style velcro closures that can be adjusted for the perfect fit.

AVAILABLE IN SIX FUN COLORS - our premium fly fringes are available in Black, Red, Royal Blue, Hunter Green, Pink/Purple, and Patriotic red, white, and blue. No matter your preference, we have a color to suit you and your horse!

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES - our fly fringes are available in the sizes Mini Horse, Pony, Cob/Arab, and Full Horse to fit equines of all breeds and sizes.

entry.title: Paris Tack Polka Dot Premium Show Crochet Horse Fly Veil Bonnet with Soft Knit Ears
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 6.95

Paris Tack’s line of crochet fly ear nets/bonnets was designed with your horse’s comfort in mind. All of our crochet bonnets are hand made by skilled craftsmen and have an attention to detail that no machine can match. These bonnets are made of all-natural, soft materials that will not harm or irritate your horse’s sensitive ears. All of our bonnets feature our unique woven soft ear design that is comfortable for long-term wear, is impervious to flies, and as a bonus, helps to lightly block sounds, making these great for nervous or spooky horses. All of our ear nets also feature secure easy attachment neck straps that allow you to attach these to your bridle, or simply loop the strap around your horse to prevent slippage. Whether you’re looking to protect your horse against flies and other insects at the barn, in the arena, or on the trail, one of our many styles of bonnets is guaranteed to be perfect for you and your horse.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - our ear nets feature a plush soft hand-woven crochet construction and soft-weave ear coverings that not only protect against biting insects but also dampen sounds that could otherwise spook your horse.

PROTECTS YOUR HORSE FROM PESTS - a horse’s ears and eyes are delicate and flies on the face will quickly cause your horse discomfort. This premium fly bonnet prevents flies from landing on or biting your horse’s ears or eyes to keep your horse happy and comfortable.

CLASSIC SHOW-RING WORTHY DESIGN - these elegant fly veils are made of high-quality materials and have been hand made by skilled craftsmen so that they are not only an important weapon against fly attacks but also the perfect show ring accessory to complement your horse.

POLKA DOT PRINT ACCENTS - this fly bonnet features a navy and white polka dot design on the ears and brow for a touch of color on a design that is still classic and perfect for the show ring.

INCLUDES AN EASY ATTACH STRAP - this premium fly bonnet has an easy to attach neck strap and loop closure that allows your bridle to be attached to your fly bonnet or the for the most secure fit possible, or the strap fitted around the neck to prevent slippage.

  • Made of soft Nylon fringe
  • Adjustable nylon web strap with Velcro closure
  • (Measured end to end) Full (15.5"-18.5"), Pony (14.5"-18"), or Mini (13.5" - 17")

entry.title: Paris Tack Patriotic American Flag Crochet Horse Fly Veil Ear Bonnet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Fly Masks
Price: 14.99

Paris Tack Patriotic American Flag Crochet Horse Fly Veil Ear Bonnet has been designed to not only help your horse look great, but to keep them more comfortable and focused when under saddle. Our ear nets provide a barrier between your horse’s ears and the outside world, which helps to muffle loud sounds to keep your horse calm and focused during competitions and events. Our bonnets  also help protect against insect bites, sunburn, frostbite, dirt, debris, and more. This ear bonnet is made of soft woven cotton to promote optimum comfort. Cotton is breathable and gentle against your horse’s delicate skin, making it comfortable to wear any time of year.


  • HELPS TO KEEP YOUR HORSE FOCUSED - ear bonnets muffle sound, which can help keep your horse calm and focused when at a competition or under saddle. Our ear bonnets can be used in combination with earplugs for very nervous or sound-sensitive horses.
  • IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE EARS - our soft knit ear bonnets are made from breathable, soft, and comfortable to wear cotton that provides a barrier to protect your horse’s sensitive ears from dirt, debris, insects, loud sounds, and other irritations.
  • PREVENTS EAR IRRITATION - this cotton ear bonnet is designed to protect your horse’s delicate ears from things like sunburn, frostbite, bug bites, and more. Our ear nets are comfortable to wear year-round and are preferred by horses.
  • HAND CROCHETED DESIGN - these ear bonnets for horses have been hand crocheted by skilled craftsmen for a high-quality finish that will look great on your horse wherever you go: whether you're on a trail, at the barn, or in the show arena.
  • AMERICAN FLAG DESIGN - this patriotic ear bonnet features the American flag on the face of the bonnet so that you can show off your love for your country. This stunning design is perfect for use in competitions, parades, or events.
